history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Sigma,incl_tran. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_app,Sigma,incl_tran. qsimpl time: 1 use: Sigma,incl_tran,sym,app_incl_l,incl_app. qsimpl time: 1 use: Sigma,incl_tran,sym,incl_refl,app_incl_l,incl_app. qsimpl time: 1 use: Sigma,incl_tran,sym,incl_refl,app_incl_l,incl_app. qsimpl time: 1 use: Sigma,incl_tran,sym,incl_refl,incl_appl,app_incl_l,incl_app. qsimpl time: 1 use: Sigma,incl_tran,sym,incl_refl,incl_appl,app_incl_l,incl_app.

exceptions.exn: In environment R : stack nat x0, y0 : string x1 : list nat H : x1 <<= Sigma Unable to unify "nat" with "(list nat * list nat)%type".

In environment H1 : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), l <<= m -> m <<= n -> l <<= n H0 : list nat R : stack nat x0, y0 : string x1 : list nat H : x1 <<= Sigma a : ?M2298 Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M2298) (l : list ?M2298) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) a (?M2299 ++ ?M2300)" with "(fix In (a : list nat * list nat) (l : list (list nat * list nat)) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) a (cards x1)".

exceptions.tactic: apply app_incl_l with (A := x0) (B := y0 ++ sym R).
